original_text: The living things went wherever the spirit wanted them to go. The wheels would also go with them. That was because the spirit of the living things was in each wheel.
korean_text: 영이 어떤 쪽으로 가면 생물들도 영이 가려 하는 곳으로 가고 바퀴들도 그 곁에서 들리니 이는 생물의 영이 그 바퀴들 가운데에 있음이니라

sentences.original_text: wherever the spirit wanted them to go
The wheels would also go with them
the spirit of the living things was in each wheel
sentences.korean_translation: 생물들의 영이 각 바퀴 안에 있었기 때문입니다
